name: Through Chimney to Your Home
description:
Through the Chimney to Your Home is a holiday themed post office simulator by Ancient Biscuit Games. This project was done for the Cozy Winter Jam 2022. 

Our game allows you to be the post office employee who checks presents to make sure they reach the right person and make their holidays!

Controls: 

Player Movement: W/A/S/D
Pick up package: E
Hold ALT to rotate
ALT + Right Click: Center Object
ALT + Scroll: Zoom in/out Object
Left Click: Push button 

Ancient Biscuit Games: 

Alexander Nilsson

Ece Yünlü 

Hande Özkur

Maria Prosvirova

Michelle Karpielová

Tobias Nühlen 

Credits:
